summary: Tweaks every Khajiit in the game to look better and not so smashed-faced and chihuahua-eyed.
descriptionHtml:
Every single khajiit in the game has been tweaked by hand to look more like a tiger or bobcat in facial structure and not some wide-eyed Chihuahua monstrosity.  Only Kharjo had his facial hair changed, all other NPC\'s are intact, just their nose/eyes/face have been changed with in-game sliders and honestly, it makes a world of difference.

Oh, this mod also makes Kharjo and J\'Zargo Essential, and increases Kharjo\'s level cap to 75.  Just because.

Screenshot has the CoverKhajiits mod installed, I highly recommend getting that in addition to this mod.

Also available on steam workshop - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9711
author: BeakieHelmet
